title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys are all gathered on Cartman's couch watching
text: television. They are all laughing.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: That was awesome!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman's mother steps in front of the T.V.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Would you boys like some cheesy poofs?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Pissed) Get out of the way, mom! The Terrance and Phillip Thanksgiving special is on!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Walking away) Sure hon.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Calling after her) And yeah we want cheesy poofs!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Terrance and Phillip, wearing pilgrim hats, stand in front
text: of a boat.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey Terrance, looks like this might be a good place to start a new colony.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It sure does Phillip. Nobody will oppress our religion here!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: OH!! YOU STAINED MY PILGRIM HAT, BUTT PIPE!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys all laugh merrily, now surrounded by bags of cheesy
text: poofs.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Did you guys see that?! That was sweet!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Coming up next on The Terrance and Phillip Thanksgiving Special, Phillip farts on Terrance and laughs!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, Cool!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: And now a word from our sponsor.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: A commercial begins. An image of desolate, barren land.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Voice over) Here in the heart of Africa, children are dying. Not from disease or war... but from hunger.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: An image of starving kids with flies all around them.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I'm Sally Struthers...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Sally steps in front of the camera; a big, fat pig.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: These children are in desperate need, and only you can help.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey, who's that fat chick?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sally Struthers, dude. She used to be on Full House.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You see, here in the middle of Africa, food is extremely scarce --

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Doesn't look like she's having any trouble finding food.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, she's fatter than Cartman.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah. ...Hey!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: For just five dollars a month, you can sponsor a child.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: That's stupid. Who the hell would want to do that?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sponsor now, and we'll also send you this Taiko Digital Sports watch as a free gift.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: KICK ASS!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sweet!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys all rush to the phone.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I'll call! I know my mom's credit card number!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Did they say if its water-proof?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hello? Is this Sally Struthers? (Pause) Oh...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What'd she say?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Shut up, butt pirate, I'm trying to hear!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ass rammer.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Into phone) Yes... Yeah, we want to adopt a starving Etheropian.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: When do we get the sports watch?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: JUST A SECOND, FAT ASS!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You vas diferens!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Into the phone) Hello? No, it's a mastercard...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Stan suddenly stops and puts the phone down.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (To Cartman) Vas diferens?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys all look at Cartman, who just shrugs.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Mph rmph rm rpmh.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ask her if we get the watch right away!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Back to the phone) Do we get the sports watch right away? (to the other boys) She says we do.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Coooool.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I get to wear it first you guys!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The class is decorated with Thanksgiving garb. The boys are
text: ancy in their seats.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I can't wait to get out of school and get our Taiko Sports watch!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, but I get to wear it first. I said!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Mr. Garrison steps in front of the class.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Children, children, to honor this special time of year, we'll be doing a canned food drive. Does anybody know what a canned food drive is?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yes, Eric?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: When they cut up a chick's stomach to get a baby out?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: ...No, that's a Caesarian section, Eric... But that's okay. Remember there are no stupid questions, just stupid people.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: A canned food drive is when we collect canned food for poor people who can't afford to eat on Thanksgiving.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Pointing) You mean like Kenny?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Exactly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Raising his hand) Mr. Garrison, why do poor people always smell like sour milk?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Garrison sighs and rolls his eyes.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I don't know, Eric, they just do.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kyle leans over and smells Kenny.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Now children, I want each of you to bring in ONE CAN of food, and later the Mayor of South Park will divide it up amongst Kenny's family and other poor people.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I'm not bringing in food for poor people. Screw them!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Don't you want to help those who are less fortunate?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey you guys, do you hear something? I think I hear the flower children calling.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This is the one time of year you're supposed to care about people who can't eat.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Isn't it enough that I pay taxes?! What about the poor houses that I pay for?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Many would rather die than go to those places!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well then perhaps they should, and decrease the surplus population!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, kids, that's enough Dickens for one day. Let's get on with our lesson. Right Mr. Hat?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: That's right Mr. Garrison, Englbert Humperdink was the first person on the moon, who was second?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Suddenly, a group of turkeys burst into the classroom and
text: gobble loudly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: AGHAGAGAH!!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The turkeys peck and move wildly, causing all the kids to
text: jump up on their desks. Even Mr. Garrison gets up on his desk.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What the hell is going on?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The Turkeys quickly tear the room apart. Knocking over desks,
text: and tearing everything off the walls.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Just as quickly as they came, the turkeys leave. Leaving the
text: classroom a disaster.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well... You don't see that everyday.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The mayor is pacing in her office.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, now once we have all the canned foods collected... We'll need some clever way to distribute them to the poor...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It should be something festive!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Suddenly, the genetic engineer (Mr. Mephesto from ep. 105)
text: bursts into the office with his little monkey boy.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Mayor! We've got a very big problem!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ah... You're that insane genetic engineer from up on the hill, right?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yes, and I may have made a horrible mistake! I was trying to genetically engineer Turkeys for Thanksgiving...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Skeptical) Uh-huhhhh....

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You know, to provide food for the needy.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Still skeptical) Of course.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well, something went wrong, and the turkeys broke free, and the worst part is... They're REALLY pissed off!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Still Skeptical) Nnnaturally...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The Mayor turns to her assistants and does a 'crazy' signal
text: with her hand. The assistants laugh.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh do go on.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We have to stop them or they could destroy everything! Time is short!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The mayor again turns to her assistants, but this time pulls
text: out a koo-koo clock, and turns it on so the little bird comes out -- 'Koo-koo'

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You were saying?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: They act just like normal turkeys, except they're evil.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, my...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The mayor turns yet again to her assistants, this time, she
text: pulls a large mule out of nowhere. The mule goes 'heehorr' and the assistants laugh.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Somehow I don't think you're taking me seriously.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Now why would you say that?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys BURST in through Cartman's front door.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Ad libbing) DID IT COME?! DID IT COME?! IS IT HERE YET?! I GET TO USE IT FIRST YOU GUYS!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys look around and see nothing.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Mom... Did our Digital Sports Watch come yet?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Peeping in) Not yet, hon...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Damn!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey look you guys!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: And now back to part two of the Terrance & Phillip Thanksgiving Special

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I sure am cold Phillip.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yes, and hungry too. Being a Pilgrim totally sucks ass.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Gosh, I hope we don't starve.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Suddenly, there is a knock at the door! The boys all look at
text: each other with huge eyes.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: After a pause, they RUSH to the door.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: THE DIGITAL SPORTS WATCH IS HERE!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Standing there, looking pitiful and hungry, is a little
text: Ethiopian child.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What the hell?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Dude, that's not a digital sports watch.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey... It looks like one of those Etheropians.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, man! They must have accidentally sent him instead of the Sports watch!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Maybe they took it literally when we said we wanted to adopt a kid!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Making clicking sounds) Embaba dabubu.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Whoa! That was cool!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, how'd he make those clicking sounds?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What's your name, dude?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Bubu da Barbin.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I think he said his name is 'Marvin'.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Laughing) Yeah. STARVIN' Marvin!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Nice to meet you, Starvin' Marvin!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey Mom!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Leaning in) Yes, hon?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We found a Etheropian; can we keep him?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sure, hon.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sweet.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Dude, let's bring him to school tomorrow!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Come on, Starvin' Marvin! I want you to meet my little brother.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No, No! He's my son, I adopted him.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It was MY mom's credit card!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, okay we'll switch off. Starvin' Marvin can stay here for a week. Then at Stan's, then with me.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, and never with Kenny 'cause his family is too poor.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Totally!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys all laugh. Kenny kicks Cartman.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: OW!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: A young couple is walking along the pond holding hands and
text: looking lovingly at one another.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Look how the leaves fall so delicately on the surface of the pond. It's so beautiful...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Not as beautiful as you.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: They kiss. Over the woman's shoulder the man sees a group of
text: turkeys. They have doubled in number.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, Darling, look. Thanksgiving turkeys.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ooh, They're so beautiful...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Not as beautiful as you.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The turkeys come close and surround the couple. The man turns
text: to the woman.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Look at the way they foam at the mouth. Like beautiful suds of beer.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Not as beautiful as --

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Just then the group of turkeys attacks and tears the couples
text: clothes to shreds.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: INT. ALL YOU CAN EAT BUFFET - NIGHT

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys and their families are gathered around a HUGE table.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This is a great way for you to experience America, Starvin' Marvin. This is what we call an 'All you can eat buffet'.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, here you can eat all you want for only $6.99 That's why we all come here on Tuesday nights. Except for Kenny's family, 'cause to them $6.99 is two year's income.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Why is YOUR family poor, Starvin' Marvin? Is your dad an alcoholic too?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin just sits there. A waiter walks in and sets down a
text: large plate of shrimp.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You see, Starvin Marvin, these are what we call APPETIZERS.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Apee-tiser.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This is what you eat before you eat... to make you more hungry.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The waiter reappears with several plates of food.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oop! Food's here! That's it for the appetizers!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman grabs the plate of shrimp and tosses it into a trash
text: can. Marvin's eyes absolutely pop.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys start to gorge themselves.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No Starvin' Marvin that's my pot pie!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Cartman you butt pipe, this is the time of year you're supposed to share.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh yeah you're right. (to Marvin) Are you going to eat all of your peach cobbler? No you don't want all that. Why don't you share it with me... Let me just have some of that.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Garrison stands before the class holding a box that reads
text: "Canned Food Drive."

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Children, children, I'm a little disappointed in your Thanksgiving spirit. Only a few cans have been donated to our canned food drive...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Garrison pulls out a few cans.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: And can't we do a little better than -- (Reading the cans) Creamed corn, creamed corn and creamed corn?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Please bring in more diverse food children, or else Kenny's family is going to have a pretty 'corny' Thanksgiving.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Garrison pauses, and then starts laughing wildly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The kids all just sit there, Kenny just stares, as Garrison
text: slaps his knee and laughs like he just told the best joke in the world.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Corny... Corny... Gravy... Corny Thanksgiving... Hoo!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Anyway, children, I understand a few of you have brought in something special for show and tell...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman, Kyle, Stan, and Kenny raise their hands.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (ad lib) Yeah, yeah... We did. We do! We do!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: All right, boys, show us what you've brought.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The boys walk with Starvin' Marvin to the front of the class.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This is our new Ethernopian, Starvin' Marvin.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin looks around nervously. He peeks into the box of canned
text: food.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: He can do really cool stuff with his voice. Show 'em, Starvin' Marvin.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin says nothing, but instead reaches into the box and
text: pulls out a can of cream corn.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No! Starvin' Marvin, that's KENNY's creamed corn!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman grabs the can and puts it back in the box

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No Starvin' Marvin... That's a BAD starvin' Marvin!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Boys, what the hell are you doing? This is horribly, horribly WRONG!! How did you get this child?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: He was accidentally delivered to us instead of a sports watch.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: The sports watch from the commercial?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, that one.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I want a Starvin' Marvin!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Me too!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yes I'll pay fifty dollars for one!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: All of a sudden, all the other children go crazy. AD LIBBING
text: 'I want a Etheopian' etc.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Boys, you're too young to take care of a child. I'm afraid I'm going to have to call the Red Cross and have him returned.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (To Stan) Aw! I TOLD you we shouldn't have brought him to school, dude!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, thank you very much. Yes, you can pick him up tonight. Bye now.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Now, boys I hope you've learned your lesson.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You can't care for this child!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: But I thought we were supposed to care on Thanksgiving.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yes, but you don't actually get involved with the child's lives. You're supposed to just send money. And once in a while they write you a letter.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You see, Marvin didn't grow up in a normal place like South Park.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: So why can't he live here now?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Because he can't!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Because why?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Because 8 year olds can't be parents.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Then you take care of him.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I can't. I'm, ah, very busy. I send my $5 a month. See?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This sucks. Starvin' Marvin is our friend.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh well, back to the poor country with you.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You better watch what you say Cartman. You might be poor and hungry some day.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh yeah, right.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Inside his lab, Mephesto is looking through a microscope.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I knew you were the only person who would listen to me, Chef.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, well let's get it over with. This place gives me the Bubujeebies.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Look here, my microscope. Tell me what you see...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Mephesto gestures towards his microscope. Chef puts his eye
text: on it.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Uhh... I see an extreme close up of Vanessa Redgrave's private parts.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, whoops.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Mephesto quickly switches the plates under the microscope.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: NOW tell me what you see.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well, I'm no biologist, but I'd say it looks like Turkey DNA.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Precisely. But look how rapidly its dividing.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What does it mean?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It means the turkeys are growing at an exponential rate. If we don't destroy them all...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: They'll take over the town. Maybe the WORLD!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh Fudge!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Pause) Aah, lemme' see that Vanessa Redgrave thing again...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sure.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The sun sets, and night falls on South Park,

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Starvin' Marvin sits in the dark in Cartman's living room.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: We hear car doors slam. Starvin' Marvin's eyes grow wide.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The front door bursts open. Two men in suits burst in.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hello there little boy, we're looking for a starving African child who was accidentally sent here instead of a Taiko Sports Watch.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin thinks for a LONG time...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Finally, Marvin points to Cartman's bedroom. The agents exit
text: offscreen.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: We HEAR the agents bust into Cartman's room.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey! Hey! What's going on? Hey, let go of me! I'll kick you in the nuts! Okay man?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin is looking in the direction of the bedroom. The agents
text: enter. One has Cartman wrapped in a blanket slung over his shoulder. We HEAR Cartman mumbling.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (TO Marvin) Here's your sports watch, son. Sorry for the mix up.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin takes the watch. The agents leave.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (O.S. and distant) HEY!!!! seriously. You're pissing me off...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: We HEAR the screech of tires. There is a pause. Marvin looks
text: down at the watch on his wrist. Then he looks up.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sweeeet.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: There is a large crowd gathered in the middle of South Park.
text: We see the canned food grab capsule. There is a podium and microphone set up.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The mayor and her assistant stand next to the can grab
text: capsule.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: So, how does this thing work?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well, Mayor. Its based on the cash grab. But instead of money, the cans of food are blown around inside the capsule. The pov catches as many as he can to feed his family.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Pov?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: POVerty stricken citizen.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, brilliant!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Suddenly the flock of wild turkeys (it is bigger now) attacks
text: the Thanksgiving decorations. A flurry of feathers, decorations and gobbling.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Aaaah! What the HELL is THIS?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I don't know, Mayor. (looking at a program) I don't think it's listed on the program.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: They're increasing in number!! Mayor, these are the vicious Turkeys I warned you about!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Chef appears Stan, Kyle and Kenny are following him.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It's true, Mayor! those turkeys just ripped apart my cafeteria!! WHOA!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Just then the turkeys run past Chef, gobbling.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: YOU WON'T GET AWAY WITH THIS YOU BASTARDS!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Wow! Those are some PISSED OFF turkeys!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, people, don't panic. Bring out the defense squad!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Jimbo and Ned appear with shotguns. They immediately start
text: firing their guns, and the turkeys start running away.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We need more than that! They'll only come back in increased numbers!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Starvin' Marvin is sitting on Cartman's couch eating a pot-
text: pie and watching TV.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Terrance and Phillip are both wearing pilgrim costumes sitting
text: at a thanksgiving table with Native Americans.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey Phillip, could you pass the beans?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Beans? Oh, oh, looks like we'll be at war with these Indians soon. Wait wait wait, here it comes... Oh, I crapped my pants.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Terrance lets out a good fart. They both laugh. Marvin laughs.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, I think you got some spatter on Chief Running Wolf!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I spattered his face.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Now he's a smelly Indian.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We'll be back to Part Fourteen of the Terrance and Phillip Thanksgiving Special right after this:

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hunger is an enemy that we ALL must fight...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The camera PANS across the starving people.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: These children desperately need your support...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The camera PANS across more starving Ethiopians. Now we see
text: Cartman in the background.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (In the distance) HEY! SOMEBODY GET ME OUT OF HERE! THIS SUCKS!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: So please call and adopt a child today.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Still in distance) I'M SERIOUSLY GETTING PISSED OFF OVER HERE!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin smiles at the television and takes another bite of
text: his pot-pie.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Leaning in) You want some more cheesy poofs, hon?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ya I won da cheesy poof!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sweet.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: In the barren, desolate African landscape, Cartman is walking
text: among the starving masses, pissed off.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: This is SERIOUS BullSHIT!! There has to be a Happy Burger around here somewhere...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman walks by a starving family.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Innocent and Sweet) Excuse me, I am a lost little boy. Could you help me?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The family just lies there, dying.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Well SCREW YOU TOO!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Waving his arms around) What the? ...Who the hell let all these flies in here?! Hasn't anybody ever heard of insect repellent?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK TOWN SQUARE - DAY

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The whole town has gathered for the Thanksgiving day canned
text: food grab.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny is onstage with the mayor.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Alright everyone, it's time to give out canned food to the poor.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The townspeople cheer. Stan and Kyle look at each other with
text: concern.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Hey, where's Cartman?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I don't know. Do you know where he is Marvin?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Looks like we have the turkey problem under control. It's time to embrace the spirit of giving with the canned food grab!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (To Kenny) Come on. Hurry up!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny walks into the capsule. The air-tight door closes behind
text: him.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Now we see Kenny's family for the first time. His mother,
text: father, brother and sister are all average looking, but dressed poorly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Grab a lot, son!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: HAPPY HAPPY THANKSGIVING. LET'RRRRR RIP!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: A whirring sound is heard and the cans begin to fly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: C'MON, GRAB THOSE CANS LITTLE BOY!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny gets hit with cans and tossed around roughly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Come on, Kenny!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: C'mon son!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: It gets more violent as the power of the air actually picks
text: Kenny up off the ground and makes him fly around like the cans.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: For a moment we can't even tell what's happening, just a
text: blur of whirling cans and Kenny. Finally the mayor shuts the machine off.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny stumbles out, dizzy and holding just one little can.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Now let's see all the goodies you're gonna take home to your family!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The mayor grabs the can from Kenny, who passes out.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: It looks like he got a... a can of string beans!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: But they stop when they hear a familiar, ominous sound...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What the...?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: DUDE! THE MUTANT TURKEYS ARE BACK!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Everybody panics! They turn to see the turkeys, now a huge
text: mass, heading towards them!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The turkeys attack! There are hundreds of them and they
text: immediately tear into everything. It is total pandemonium. Barbrady tries to keep control.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Okay, people, move along! Nothing to see here, lookie loos!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: But the chaos continues. There is screaming and blood and
text: feathers. Finally, the turkeys run off.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Mephesto runs up to the Mayor.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: I tried to tell you but you didn't listen!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Into the microphone) Gather 'round everybody, and listen good! Go to your homes and arm your... (looking at Monkey Boy) What the hell are you supposed to be anyway?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: That's not important right now.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: No! What the hell is this little thing supposed to be? It doesn't look like anything.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Chef! The turkeys!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh alright. Listen up everybody, and listen good. Go to your homes and arm yourselves with whatever you can. We'll meet back here in fifteen minutes. Hurry!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We're not gonna let our thanksgiving be ruined by a bunch of turkeys!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman now looks beaten, tired and hungry as he roams the
text: African landscape.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You guys... Seriously... I'm HUNGRY!!! I HAVE TO EAT!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Just then Cartman notices a group of Americans. Several red
text: cross members with a box.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh sweet, the Red Cross. I'll have fried chicken and a side of mashed potatoes please.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sorry kid, but we're out of food. We ran out of funding.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: What!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We just couldn't get enough sponsors back home. So now we've got to pack it up.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: But I'm not a starvin' ethernopian. I have to get back home too.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Sorry dude, we just don't have any funds. Here have a Taiko sports watch.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: WEAKKKKK!!!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The residents of South Park are armed and ready for battle
text: atop a hill. It's like a scene out of braveheart.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: They are armed with guns, knifes, baseball bats and pieces
text: of wood.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: People... We all have to do our part against the evil turkeys...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: There's too many of them.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Come on, where is that Thanksgiving spirit?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We can't stop them.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Chef rides in on a horse. His face is painted half blue,
text: half white.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Today you fight for your city! You fight for your honor! These turkeys will continue to push until they have taken everything from us!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: These fudged up turkeys from the crustaceous era can take our lives, but they can never take our FREEDOM!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: On the other side, the turkeys are rallying too.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: They are gathered in a mass, ready for battle. One turkey
text: stands in front of them, it's face is painted half blue, half white, it appears to be giving a speech.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Gobble, gobble gobble gobble gobble gobble gobble gobble! Gobble gobble!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Gobble gobble! Gobble, Gobble gobble gobble gobble gobble gobble!!! gobble gobble GOBBLE!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: They turn and face the townspeople.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Here you go turkeys!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The turkey leader gives a war gobble! The turkeys all follow.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: THE TWO MASSES CHARGE EACH OTHER!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (To Assistant) Does my hair look okay?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Can't... go on... need appetizer... (Shouting to the sky) I'M SORRY GOD, I'M SORRY I MOCKED POOR PEOPLE!! I'M SORRY I WASN'T MORE SENSITIVE!! PLEASE!!! PLEASE GOD!!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: He just lays there looking dead for several seconds.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Quietly) My God has forsaken me...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Finally, he picks his head up and sees a small building.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman gets up and walks to the building.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Whoa, I wonder what's in here?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The inside is incredible. STACKS upon STACKS of food!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: SNACKY CAKES!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: There's a big screen television, a beautiful stereo and a
text: decadent furniture set.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman rounds the corner to find a fat white woman sitting
text: on the couch eating cake, watching T.V., and being fanned by two Ethiopians.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: SALLY STRUTHERS?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Eating cake) Who the hell are you?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Give me that cake!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (A la Cartman) Nooo, this is MY cake!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: NO SALLY STRUHTHERS, GIMME THE CAKE!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Nooo! You can't have any!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh yeah?!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman walks back out the door.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Cartman bursts out the door and shouts to all the Ethiopians.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: YOU GUYS!! SALLY STRUTHERS IS HOLDING FOOD FROM US!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, oh...

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The two masses collide. An incredible battle ensues.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Blood and gobbling everywhere. Graphic shots of turkeys
text: getting pummelled with baseball bats and South Parkers being smothered.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The children, armed, are standing close to Chef.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Stay close, children!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Chef guards the children, killing a few attacking turkeys.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: But just then, several turkeys jump on Kenny! Kenny flails
text: around, but the turkeys hold tight.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: More Turkeys jump on Kenny as he jumps around and tries to
text: get away. But the turkeys overpower him.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny falls to the ground where turkeys pluck out his
text: eyeballs.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh my God! They've killed Kenny!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You bastards!!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: The last three are getting away. Shoot 'em Ned!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Ned fires on the remaining turkeys.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We did it!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Finally, the battle slows as the last of the turkeys is
text: destroyed.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (standing over the turkey carcasses) My God, what have we done?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We've saved Thanksgiving!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: But all those poor turkeys... They're all dead!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Every turkey dies. Not every turkey truly lives.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: As horrible as they were, they felt like a part of me. Perhaps I shouldn't be toying with God's creations... Perhaps I should just --

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (We've all heard this before) Yeah, yeah, yeah......

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The two agents step through the carnage and approach the
text: kids and Chef. Marvin is not visible.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Excuse me, sir. We're looking for a little starving Ethiopian boy who was accidentally delivered to South Park instead of Taiko sports watch.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Have you seen anyone fitting this description?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Oh, that could be a hundred kids in this town, Mister.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: But suddenly, Marvin walks up and tugs on the agents pantleg.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: There you are!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Are you ready to go home now?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Marvin looks at Mr. Garrison, Chef, Barbrady... And then
text: nods his head quickly.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The agents take Marvin's hand and lead him past the Turkey
text: carnage.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Wow... It sucks he has to leave.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah, I like him a lot more than Cartman.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: You know, I think I've learned something today. It's really easy not to think of images on TV as real people, but they are. That's why it's easy to ignore those commercials. But people on TV are just as real as you or I.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Yeah... (Thinking) And that means that McGyver is a real person too.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Three red cross members are escorting Cartman through the
text: village. Cartman is eating a pot-pie as he walks.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: We're terribly sorry about the mix- up little boy. We'll get you back home immediately.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: That's right you will, God dammit!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: They walk past the food line.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Move it, Povs! I'm an AMERICAN!!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: A large plane lands in the midst of the desolate village.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Little Marvin steps off and is immediately surrounded by his
text: friends and family.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Ababa!! Dlook dlook baba raka!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Baba dlook ri nama bam!

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: As more people gather around, Starvin Marvin gestures to the
text: plane. Everyone looks on as hundreds of dead Turkeys are dropped from cargo hold.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Several Ethiopians start grabbing the turkeys as others hoist
text: Marvin up on their shoulders and victoriously march him into the town --

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: -- passing, on the way, Sally Struthers is bound and gagged
text: and tied to a pole.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: It is indeed a POV house; small and cheap.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: Kenny's family (mother, father, sister, brother) are gathered
text: around a humble table. The dishes are set, and in the middle of the table, on a little serving tray, is the can of green beans.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The family joins hands in prayer.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: (Sarcastically) Lord, on this day of thanks we would like to extend our DEEPEST gratitude for this INCREDIBLE BOUNTY of green beans you have bestowed upon us. And though you for some reason found it necessary to take our son from us, and though you for some reason find pleasure in watching us suffer... Still, we give thanks... Amen.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: Amen.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
role: The family sits there for a long time.

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: ...Does anybody have a can opener?

title: STARVIN MARVIN
text: God dammit.
